frame.name: Daring
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> performs some <fen>Action</fen> which is considered imprudent. This frame is distinct from Attempt in that the danger that the <fen>Agent</fen> puts themselves in by performing the <fen>Action</fen> is profiled. The danger is not spelled out, but generally the <fen>Action</fen> has a possibility or likelihood of causing social or physical harm to the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>risked</t> <fex name="Action">taking another look</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual that performs the <fen>Action</fen>, resulting in danger to themself.
<ex>I do n't think <fex name="age">you</fex> should <t>hazard</t> the ascent in the dark , that 's all .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE denotes the <fen>Action</fen> taken by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>chanced</t> <fex name="Action">a peek at myself</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The purpose for which the <fen>Action</fen> is performed. <ex>He <t>risked</t> a look back <fex name="Purpose">to check for pursuit</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> the <fen>Agent</fen> takes the risk. <ex>She <t>risked</t> a disguise <fex name="Explanation">since they already had a photo of her</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> dares to perform the <fen>Action</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Time">At dawn</fex>, the Captain <t>chanced</t> opening the hatch.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> risks doing the <fen>Action</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Place">Back in his room</fex>, he <t>risked</t> peeking inside.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the risking action which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>).
<ex>If you <fex name="Manner">carelessly</fex> <t>chance</t> going back there, you deserve what you get.</ex>
</def-root>
